attributes.name: openness
attributes.description: Willingness to consider new experiences and ideas.

attributes.name: conscientiousness
attributes.description: Tendency to be organized, responsible, and thorough.

attributes.name: extraversion
attributes.description: Sociability and orientation toward external stimulation.

attributes.name: agreeableness
attributes.description: Cooperativeness, kindness, and consideration for others.

attributes.name: neuroticism
attributes.description: Tendency toward emotional instability or sensitivity.

attributes.name: adaptability
attributes.description: Ability to adjust to new conditions and feedback.

attributes.name: empathy
attributes.description: Capacity to understand and share the feelings of others.

attributes.name: curiosity
attributes.description: Desire to learn, explore, and discover.

attributes.name: conciseness
attributes.description: Ability to express ideas clearly and succinctly.
